context: I don’t get people like Bezos. If I had billions of dollars, I would impulsively start fixing stuff. Homeless vets? I don’t think so. Hungry children? Not on my watch. He could be Batman. What a waste.

replies.context: He's a big part of the global elites. Like all of them, he'll get his comeuppance.

More than The Donald.  Likely, more than you.
